metadata.description: A collection of plugins that extend Claude's capabilities with engineering analysis, documentation, and specification tools

plugins.name: documentation-architect
plugins.description: Transform documentation using the Di√°taxis framework

plugins.name: research-opportunity-investigator
plugins.description: Research and opportunity investigation for protocols

plugins.name: specification-refiner
plugins.description: Systematic analysis and refinement of specifications with SEAMS framework, sequential clarification questioning, and 9-phase workflow

plugins.name: speckit-generator
plugins.description: Specification and task management with PLANS taxonomy, ADR-style decisions, SMART acceptance criteria, SEAMS clarification, anti-pattern detection (50 patterns), 4-level verification (stub detection + wiring checks), execution orchestration (deviation rules, checkpoint taxonomy, auth gates, session continuity), tech-specific designer agents, git checkpoints, and session-memory hooks. Outputs to speckit/ directory.

plugins.name: trade-study-analysis
plugins.description: Systematic trade study using DAU 9-Step Process

plugins.name: session-memory
plugins.description: Persistent session memory with searchable storage and checkpoints

plugins.name: rcca-master
plugins.description: Orchestrate complete 8D investigations with integrated tool selection and domain-specific team formation guidance. Use for RCCA, root cause analysis, corrective action, failure investigation, nonconformance analysis, quality problems, or customer complaints.

plugins.name: problem-definition
plugins.description: Guide RCCA/8D problem definition using 5W2H and IS/IS NOT analysis. Transforms failure data into precise, measurable problem statements without embedded cause or solution.

plugins.name: five-whys-analysis
plugins.description: Conduct rigorous 5 Whys root cause analysis with guided questioning, quality scoring, and professional report generation. Includes validation tests and countermeasure development.

plugins.name: fishbone-diagram
plugins.description: Create Fishbone (Ishikawa/Cause-and-Effect) diagrams for structured root cause brainstorming with 6Ms, 8Ps, 4Ss, or custom categories. Generates SVG diagrams and HTML reports.

plugins.name: pareto-analysis
plugins.description: Conduct Pareto Analysis (80/20 Rule) to identify vital few causes driving majority of problems. Generates Pareto charts and prioritization reports.

plugins.name: kepner-tregoe-analysis
plugins.description: Conduct Kepner-Tregoe (KT) PSDM analysis using Situation Appraisal, Problem Analysis (IS/IS NOT), Decision Analysis (MUSTS/WANTS), and Potential Problem Analysis.

plugins.name: fault-tree-analysis
plugins.description: Conduct Fault Tree Analysis (FTA) for system failure analysis using Boolean logic gates. Identifies minimal cut sets, single points of failure, and failure probabilities.

plugins.name: fmea-analysis
plugins.description: Conduct FMEA for systematic failure mode identification using AIAG-VDA 7-step methodology. Supports DFMEA, PFMEA, and FMEA-MSR with Action Priority risk assessment.
